text: 23 Amo 4.11, Sek 3.2-5, Lom 11.14, 1 Ko 3.15, Lep 3.4 Ogɨnap mab mɨŋɨlaŋ adek ak amnɨgel tek lup agɨl, kɨlop kasek tɨg asɨk dem kɨm amnɨgel. Ogɨnap mapen nɨŋɨd dɨnɨmɨb ak pen, mɨdupmɨdup pɨg jup tek gɨpal ak, chɨn abe gɨnɨgun tek lup agɨl, nɨgtep gɨl yenɨmɨb. Bɨ anɨb okok kɨli mɨdupsek gach sek mɨdebal, walɨj tap kɨli abe gach sek mɨdeb. Pen gach kɨli gɨpal okok asɨk tep gɨnɨmɨb.
